title: Downloads
metaDescription: Download PDF resources from the Global Governance Frameworks

hero.title: Downloads & Resources
hero.subtitle: Framework documentation and resources in downloadable formats

intro: Download our framework documentation in PDF format for offline reading, printing, or sharing with others. These resources are designed to help you understand and implement the Global Governance Framework in your context.

principles.title: Core Principles
principles.description: The foundational principles that guide the Global Governance Framework, including decentralized authority, transparency, direct participation, and more.

treaty.title: Treaty for Our Only Home (Full Framework)
treaty.description: The complete, ready-to-implement v1.0 framework. This document provides the full architectural blueprint for upgrading global governance to address the 21st century's polycrisis.

implementation.title: Implementation Guidelines
implementation.description: Practical approaches for implementing the Global Governance Framework in various contexts, including decision allocation, phased implementation, and common challenges.

caseStudies.title: Case Studies
caseStudies.description: Real-world examples of multi-level governance in action, demonstrating how the framework principles have been applied in diverse contexts.

resources.title: Resources
resources.description: Books, tools, organizations, and other resources for further exploration of the Global Governance Frameworks concepts.

globalCitizenship.title: Global Citizenship Framework
globalCitizenship.description: Our Global Citizenship Framework provides a comprehensive approach to fostering planetary identity and collective action, based on universal values that transcend cultural boundaries.

full.title: Complete Global Citizenship Framework
full.description: The complete framework provides an in-depth guide to understanding and practicing global citizenship at all levels, from awareness to leadership.

summary.title: 4-Page Summary
summary.description: A concise overview of the Global Citizenship Framework, perfect for quick reference or introduction to the concepts.

errors.title: File Not Available
errors.fileUnavailable: The document "{filename}" is not yet available in {language}. We're working to make all documents available in multiple languages.
errors.suggestion: Try switching to English if available, or contact us if you need this document urgently.

implementationFrameworks.title: Domain-Specific Implementation Frameworks
implementationFrameworks.description: Detailed frameworks for implementing governance principles in specific domains, providing concrete guidance for various sectors and challenges.

moreTools.title: More Domain-Specific Implementation Frameworks
moreTools.description: Additional downloadable materials, interactive tools, and detailed implementation guides are available on our Tools page:

emergentGovernance.title: Emergent Governance Protocol Framework
emergentGovernance.description: The foundational operational protocol defining the 'Minimum Viable Grammar' for all interactions within the GGF ecosystem, enabling decentralized, bottom-up, and adaptive governance through universal sense-propose-adopt system calls.

indigenous.title: Indigenous & Traditional Knowledge Governance
indigenous.description: A comprehensive framework for Indigenous-led planetary transformation, featuring bioregional governance, Traditional Ecological Knowledge protection, and ceremonial stewardship pathways.

moralOperatingSystem.title: Moral Operating System Framework
moralOperatingSystem.description: Ethical source code for planetary governance providing the moral foundation for all frameworks, including the Dynamic Rights Spectrum, guardianship protocols, and tools for recognizing rights across humans, animals, ecosystems, AI, and future beings.

justiceSystems.title: Justice Systems Implementation Framework
justiceSystems.description: A comprehensive framework for implementing equitable, transparent, and resilient global justice systems. Includes specialized tribunals, MOS rights enforcement, Indigenous sovereignty protocols, and digital justice innovation.

aegisProtocol.title: Aegis Protocol Framework
aegisProtocol.description: A comprehensive framework for transitioning military capabilities into regenerative global security and shared exploratory missions, transforming conflict into cosmic guardianship.

shieldProtocol.title: The Shield Protocol
shieldProtocol.description: A comprehensive framework for eradicating transnational crime through coordinated intelligence, enforcement, and community-controlled oversight with developmental rehabilitation approaches.

kinshipProtocol.title: The Kinship Protocol: Gender & Intersectional Justice
kinshipProtocol.description: A comprehensive framework for embedding intersectional justice directly into global governance, ensuring all genders and identities have institutionalized power in shaping our collective future.

digital.title: Digital Commons
digital.description: Provides a comprehensive approach for managing digital resources—data, software, knowledge, and infrastructure—as shared global commons, ensuring equitable access, ethical use, and participatory governance.

financialSystems.title: Financial Systems
financialSystems.description: A comprehensive framework for implementing financial systems that prioritize human and ecological flourishing, including the Hearts currency system, Love Ledger, and tools for equitable resource distribution.

workInLiberation.title: Work in Liberation Framework
workInLiberation.description: Transformative labour and employment governance organizing work around care, creativity, and planetary health through Community Work Teams, cooperative governance, and the transition from survival work to meaningful contribution.

economic.title: Economic Integration
economic.description: A framework for creating fair and sustainable economic systems that balance local autonomy with global cooperation, including nested economic systems and resource justice implementation.

gaianTrade.title: Gaian Trade Framework
gaianTrade.description: A framework for regenerative commerce that honors planetary boundaries, uplifts communities, and ensures equity in every exchange through mechanisms like Digital Passports and Regenerative Trade Zones.

mentalHealth.title: Mental Health Framework
mentalHealth.description: A comprehensive framework for implementing community-led mental health transformation through consciousness-inclusive healing, traditional medicine integration, and rights-based care that positions mental health as a transcultural human right fostering collective flourishing.

synopticProtocol.title: The Synoptic Protocol - Media & Epistemic Integrity
synopticProtocol.description: A comprehensive global framework for fostering healthy information ecosystems, media literacy, and epistemic integrity to combat misinformation and strengthen democratic discourse.

water.title: Water & Sanitation
water.description: A comprehensive framework for transforming water governance through community control, regenerative technologies, and rights-based approaches. Includes strategies for universal access, Indigenous sovereignty, and planetary healing through water justice.

environment.title: Environmental Stewardship
environment.description: Guidelines for implementing governance structures that protect and regenerate Earth's ecosystems, operating at multiple scales from local to planetary.

oceansMarineGovernance.title: Oceans & Marine Governance Framework
oceansMarineGovernance.description: A comprehensive framework for transforming our relationship with the Blue Heart of the planet through rights-based ocean stewardship, Indigenous-led governance, and regenerative blue economy principles.

biodiversity.title: Biodiversity
biodiversity.description: A revolutionary blueprint for planetary healing through indigenous sovereignty, economic transformation, and cultural mobilization. Includes tools for Indigenous Digital Sovereignty Hubs, Bio-Arts Residencies, ecosystem rights recognition, and creating a regenerative biosphere by 2045.

animalWelfare.title: Global Guardian
animalWelfare.description: A comprehensive framework for transforming global animal welfare systems through community-led guardianship, sentience-centered protection, and regenerative approaches that position animals as beings deserving compassion rather than commodities.

climateEnergy.title: Climate & Energy Governance
climateEnergy.description: An integrated approach to governing climate action and energy transitions across local, regional, and global scales, emphasizing just transitions and intergenerational accountability.

technology.title: Technology Governance
technology.description: Frameworks for governing technological development and deployment with democratic oversight, ensuring technologies serve humanity and protect fundamental rights.

regenerativeEnterprise.title: Regenerative Enterprise Framework
regenerativeEnterprise.description: A comprehensive guide for transforming businesses to serve life, communities, and planetary wellbeing through six practical modules covering governance, operations, finance, culture, and ecosystemic engagement.

sundownProtocol.title: The Sundown Protocol Framework
sundownProtocol.description: A comprehensive just transition framework for retiring harmful industries and enabling regenerative futures. Includes worker protection protocols, community healing processes, and pathways for transforming extraction into restoration.

planetaryHealth.title: Planetary Health Governance
planetaryHealth.description: A high-level framework that serves as the ethical and scientific compass for the entire GGF ecosystem, using the Biosphere Health Index (BHI) to audit all other frameworks and ensure they contribute to the holistic well-being of our living world.

globalHealth.title: Global Health & Pandemic Security Framework
globalHealth.description: Community-controlled planetary immune system that prevents, detects, and defeats pandemics with speed, equity, and resilience while strengthening traditional knowledge and community sovereignty.

aethelredAccord.title: Aethelred Accord: Biotechnology Governance
aethelredAccord.description: A covenant for responsible stewardship of life's code through community sovereignty, Indigenous rights, and democratic oversight of genetic engineering and biotechnology development.

conduitProtocol.title: The Conduit Protocol: Shared Infrastructure Framework
conduitProtocol.description: A unified framework for transforming fragmented infrastructure into resilient global commons that provide clean energy, secure data, and clean water while respecting Indigenous sovereignty and enabling just transition.

hearthstoneProtocol.title: Hearthstone Protocol Framework
hearthstoneProtocol.description: A comprehensive framework for transitioning from extractive ownership to regenerative stewardship, providing legal pathways for land rematriation and commons governance.

peace.title: Peace & Conflict Resolution
peace.description: Frameworks for preventing and resolving conflicts through multi-level governance, ethical security approaches, and cooperative peacekeeping.

bioregionalPolis.title: The Bioregional Polis Framework
bioregionalPolis.description: An Indigenous-guided urban framework reimagining cities as regenerative hubs within Bioregional Autonomous Zones, centered on Indigenous-Led Citizen Assemblies for participatory, bioregional democracy.

livingLandProtocol.title: Living Land Protocol Framework
livingLandProtocol.description: A comprehensive framework for empowering rural communities as architects of their own regenerative future through participatory bioregional governance, BAZ-led rural councils, and sustainable rural economies.

spiritual.title: Religious & Spiritual Dialogue
spiritual.description: Approaches for fostering constructive dialogue between spiritual traditions while identifying common ethical principles that can inform governance across cultural contexts.

consciousness.title: Consciousness & Inner Development
consciousness.description: A transformative blueprint for governance rooted in self-awareness, empathy, and systemic thinking. Includes wisdom council frameworks, mindfulness training protocols, spiral dynamics integration, and tools for embedding consciousness principles into institutional structures.

deepTimeGovernance.title: Deep Time & Relativistic Governance Framework
deepTimeGovernance.description: A visionary framework governing relativistic, causal, and temporal ethics for a multi-planetary civilization. Includes governance of temporal paradoxes and deep time decision-making across cosmic scales.

meta.title: Integrated Meta-Governance
meta.description: A foundational framework for aligning diverse governance systems across domains, cultures, and timescales. It outlines principles, structures, and tools for coordination without centralization—emphasizing polycentric design, reflexive learning, and transgenerational purpose alignment.

methods-tools.title: Implementation Methods & Tools
methods-tools.description: A modular, cross-cultural governance toolkit offering participatory methods, ethical safeguards, digital infrastructures, and AI-assisted tools for real-world implementation. Designed for communities, institutions, and global bodies, it supports transparent, inclusive, and reflexive governance across all domains.

education.title: Educational Systems
education.description: Frameworks for integrating global perspectives into educational systems, promoting critical thinking, and developing curricula that foster global citizenship and cross-cultural competency.

disasterRiskReduction.title: Disaster Risk Reduction & Resilience Framework
disasterRiskReduction.description: A comprehensive framework transforming disaster management from reactive response to proactive community resilience through Indigenous-led governance, ecosystem-based solutions, and revolutionary financing mechanisms like the Global Resilience Pool.

kinshipGarden.title: The Kinship Garden Framework
kinshipGarden.description: A comprehensive framework for regenerative food systems based on Right Relationship with the land. Integrates Traditional Ecological Knowledge with global cooperation mechanisms to transform industrial agriculture into networks of regenerative abundance guided by Indigenous wisdom.

ethics.title: Ethics & Rights of Beings
ethics.description: A comprehensive framework for recognizing and protecting the rights of all beings—human, animal, ecological, and technological—with practical implementation guidance, consciousness assessment methodologies, and governance structures.

aging.title: Aging Population Support
aging.description: A comprehensive framework for transforming aging from societal burden into society's greatest strength through elder-led governance, AUBI economic systems, innovation hubs, and regenerative economics that honor elder wisdom and agency.

mobilityCommons.title: The Mobility Commons Framework
mobilityCommons.description: A comprehensive framework for regenerative transportation and mobility governance, transforming movement systems from sources of climate breakdown into pathways of connection that heal ecosystems while ensuring universal access.

regenerativeJourneys.title: Regenerative Journeys Framework
regenerativeJourneys.description: A comprehensive framework for transforming tourism from extraction to regeneration through sacred exchange, community sovereignty, and healing approaches to travel and cultural exchange.
